penalty_message: You managed to break the rake and you have to buy a new one.
You served spoiled food and got fired.
You damaged the clients car and ran away.
You drove the cleaning machine through a wall and escaped the scene.
You broke the clients lawnmower and hid it in a bush.
Your beverage caused seizures in the clients and you had to hide
You fell on the weaving sticks and they punctured your ribcage. An ambulance took you to the hospital
You cut all of the clients hair off and got fired.
You used a corrosive substance and ruined the clients shoes.
You used spoiled ingredients ant the pastries didn't sell.
You got an infection and had to go to the hospital.
The client got angry from bad customer service and threw the rock at you.
The apples were spoiled.
The pears had contaminants in them.
You acted inappropriately and lost the client.
A rogue monkey stole all your bananas.
You cheated and got disqualified.
The stitching on the pants was flawed and they got ripped up.
The customer scammed you of all the products.
You sliced the clients ear off and fled the scene.
The will had a typing error and now you face indictments.

job_name: Steal money from an elderly person
penalty_message: The person knew jiu-jitsu and choked you out.
A grenade malfunctioned blew up your finger.
You got kidnapped and sent to a concentration camp.
You were careless and slipped on blood. The police came to the scene but you managed to bribe a corrupted officer.
The police saw you and you had to bribe them.
You promised the clients too much and they took your eye.
The guards tackled you before you managed to pull your gun out. Luckily you had a knife and escaped.
The client was an undercover cop and you had to bribe them.
The Red Cross caught you red handed and took all of your blood.
